hero.title: Dominate Your Fantasy League — Free AI-Powered Projections for the Rest of the Season
hero.subtitle: Daily player projections, lineup optimization, and waiver-wire insights tailored to your league — fast, accurate, and free for the season.

daily_projections.body: Updated every morning so you can make data-driven decisions.

lineup_optimizer.body: Set the best lineup in seconds with personalized suggestions.

waiver_wire.title: Waiver Wire Recommendations
waiver_wire.body: Never miss a breakout with curated waiver moves and reasons.

about.story: CourtDominion was created to give fantasy basketball managers clear, reliable insights without the noise. The platform focuses on accuracy, speed, and simplicity so players can make smarter decisions every day.
about.mission: Deliver fast, data-driven projections and tools that help every fantasy manager improve their game.
